results.description: Non-league Maldon & Tiptree dump League Two side Leyton Orient out of the FA Cup to reach the second round for the first time.
results.shortTitle: Maldon & Tiptree earn 'fantastic' win over Orient
results.title: Leyton Orient 1-2 Maldon & Tiptree: Danny Parish scores and is sent off as non-leaguers win

thumbnail.altText: Maldon & Tiptree players celebrate victory over Leyton Orient

results.description: Watch highlights as eighth-tier Maldon & Tiptree knock League Two side Leyton Orient out of the FA Cup to reach the second round for the first time in their history,
results.title: FA Cup: Leyton Orient 1-2 Maldon & Tiptree highlights

results.description: Relive all the action from Sunday's 10 FA Cup first-round ties, including Maldon & Tiptree stunning Leyton Orient.
results.title: FA Cup: Sunday's first-round action as it happened

results.description: Listen to local radio commentaries from nine FA Cup first-round ties.
results.shortTitle: Listen: Hayes & Yeading v Oxford United
results.title: Listen: FA Cup first round commentaries including Bristol Rovers & Leyton Orient

results.description: Justin Edinburgh will be inducted into Newport County's Hall of Fame at their League Two match against Leyton Orient on 29 December.
results.shortTitle: Newport to honour Edinburgh at Orient game
results.title: Justin Edinburgh: Newport County plan to honour former manager at Leyton Orient game

results.description: A quality goal from substitute AJ Leitch-Smith gives Morecambe a vital victory over Leyton Orient at the Globe Arena.
results.title: Morecambe 1-0 Leyton Orient

results.description: Carlisle United end a run of four successive defeats in League Two with a draw at Leyton Orient.
results.title: Leyton Orient 1-1 Carlisle United

results.description: Non-league Chichester City - the lowest ranked club in the FA Cup - receive a bye to the second round following Bury's removal from the competition.
results.shortTitle: Chichester City receive FA Cup bye
results.title: FA Cup first round draw: Eighth-tier Chichester City receive bye to second round

results.description: Plymouth warm up for Saturday's eagerly-anticipated Devon derby at Exeter with a convincing 4-0 win over Leyton Orient.
results.title: Plymouth Argyle 4-0 Leyton Orient

results.description: BBC Sport takes you through five things you may have missed in the EFL, including the end of Stoke City's penalty drought.
results.title: EFL: Stoke City score a penalty at last, Brentford beat Millwall in thriller

results.description: Leyton Orient sweep aside Grimsby in front of the watching Carl Fletcher - their new manager in waiting.
results.title: Grimsby Town 0-4 Leyton Orient

results.description: League Two side Leyton Orient appoint former Plymouth Argyle manager Carl Fletcher as their new head coach.
results.shortTitle: Leyton Orient appoint Fletcher as boss
results.title: Carl Fletcher: Leyton Orient appoint ex-Plymouth boss as head coach

thumbnail.altText: New Leyton Orient head coach Carl Fletcher holds up a club scarf

results.description: Leyton Orient come from behind to record a first home league win since the opening day of the season as they beat Walsall.
results.title: Leyton Orient 3-1 Walsall

results.description: The EFL and their charity partner Mind are using street art in a bid to encourage conversations about mental health.
results.shortTitle: EFL and Mind launch street art campaign
results.title: World Mental Health Day: Street art campaign launched by English Football League

results.description: Leyton Orient and Port Vale are fined by the Football Association after an on-pitch melee during their League Two match.
results.shortTitle: Orient and Port Vale fined by FA
results.title: Orient and Port Vale fined by Football Association after on-field melee

results.description: James Brophy's goal hands Leyton Orient victory at Northampton on an emotional afternoon at Sixfields.
results.title: Northampton Town 0-1 Leyton Orient

results.description: Northampton Town play Leyton Orient for the first time since the clubs' former manager died.
results.shortTitle: Justin Edinburgh remembered as former clubs meet
results.title: Justin Edinburgh remembered as Northampton host Orient

results.description: Leyton Orient and Port Vale have been charged by the Football Association after an on-pitch melee on Saturday.
results.shortTitle: Orient and Port Vale face FA charge
results.title: Leyton Orient and Port Vale face FA charge after on-field melee in League Two match

results.description: Josh Wright scores a last-gasp equaliser for Leyton Orient in a 3-3 thriller against Port Vale at Brisbane Road.
results.title: Leyton Orient 3-3 Port Vale

results.description: Leyton Orient interim head coach Ross Embleton is to step down from his position to revert to his former role of assistant coach.
results.shortTitle: Embleton will step down as Orient boss
results.title: Ross Embleton: Leyton Orient boss to step down and revert to assistant's role
